function.name: process_document
function.description: Process a legal document using the Document Intelligence Module. Detects AFV (Accepted for Value) notation, assesses discharge eligibility based on 30-day rule, extracts entities (parties, dates, amounts, references), and classifies document type. Returns comprehensive analysis including AFV status and compliance information.

content.description: The full text content of the document to process (required)

document_type.description: Optional document type hint. If not provided, will be automatically classified. Valid types: 'bill', 'invoice', 'notice', 'summons', 'complaint', 'contract', 'promissory_note', 'unknown'

beneficiary_id.description: Optional UUID of the beneficiary to associate this document with

returns.description: Comprehensive document processing result including document type classification, extracted entities, AFV status, and discharge eligibility assessment
